title: Rachel Zegler Responds To ‘Snow White’ Backlash
description:
The upcoming live-action remake of Snow White from Disney has faced a fair amount of backlash since it was first announced. Now star Rachel Zegler, who will play the titular character Snow White in the film, has given her response. Zegler has been at the center of the backlash since she was cast in the [...]

The post Rachel Zegler Responds To ‘Snow White’ Backlash appeared first on ScreenGeek.
